metadata.title: USN-3011-1 -- HAProxy vulnerability
metadata.description: Falco Schmutz discovered that HAProxy incorrectly handled the reqdeny filter. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause HAProxy to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3011-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  haproxy - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.1 haproxy-doc - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.1 vim-haproxy - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
